FuncDef: This command enables and disables dynamic host lease state management for VPLS SAPs. For VPLS, DHCP snooping must be explicitly enabled (using thesnoopcommand) at all points where DHCP messages requiring snooping enter the VPLS instance (both from the DHCP server and from the subscribers). Lease state information is extracted from snooped DHCP ACK messages to populate lease state table entries for the SAP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of DHCP leases allowed. Values-1 to 8000.
